page.title: 15Adult leisure in Montrose.
page.content: In the Borrowfield area there has been a recent upsurge among Mums and Dads towards{more active pursuits. Golf is still the most popular hobby among men with{keep fit}coming second in a school survey.{Gardening}is pursued by both sexes as is{reading.}Dads continue to like{football, bowls and {darts}as well as{fishing, car {maintainance,photography, and {DIY.Knitting}is still clear favourite in the hobby league with Mums with reading second.{Aerobics and keep fit classes have blossomed as has{squash and{badminton}among the ladies. Much more attention is paid nowadays to health and physical fitness and people make use of the new{Sports Centre}in town as well as{jogging}through the streets or out Coronation Ave. Many take part in local{fun runs and mini {marathons}for local charities as well.
